data.title: EDEN VILLAGE PREMIUM ROYAL BEACH
data.meta_description:
Structure
Within walking distance from the traditional village of Ambatoloaka, in the famous Madirokely Bay, the Eden Village Premium Royal Beach faces the crystal-clear waters of the bay where guests can swim in a large boa-protected area protected by small boats
data.text:
Structure

Within walking distance from the traditional village of Ambatoloaka, in the famous Madirokely Bay, the Eden Village Premium Royal Beach faces the crystal-clear waters of the bay where guests can swim in a large boa-protected area protected by small boats that sailing in the surrounding waters. We are in Nosy Be, Madagascar Island, very much loved by dive enthusiasts and lovers of pristine beaches and the enchanting lifestyle "mora mora" (in lowland "piano"). The cozy and relaxing atmosphere of the village and the lush nature surrounding it are just some of the strengths of the Village: architectural style is a perfect mix between Creole and Malagasy tradition, with wooden roofs and ethnic decorations, while the rooms , bright and comfortable, are decorated with warm and modern touches. There is also a lack of entertainment and sports facilities such as the swimming pool, well-equipped wellness center, beach volleyball courts, tennis and gymnasium, while daytime and evening entertainment will be handled with enthusiasm and discretion by the engaging team Eden Viaggi .

Rooms

superior all with individually controlled air conditioning, satellite TV with Italian channel reception, mini-fridge with two bottles of water on arrival, wi-fi, safe, hairdryer, balcony or terrace. Deluxe rooms are also available, wider and furnished in minimalist style, and suites consisting of living room, large bathroom with tub and shower, bedroom and large balcony. Cribs available upon request.

Beach

with direct access from the hotel, fine sand, equipped with free umbrellas, sun loungers and beach towels.

Services

Restaurant, medical service, safe, directly on the sea with private sandy beach, sunbeds and umbrellas, beach towels, beach volleyball, beach tennis, table tennis, non-motorized water sports, Italian animation, outdoor swimming pool, children's pool, center wellness, shops / mini market, in-room safe, Wi-Fi in public areas, resident assistant.

Free transfer to Playa Sirena 3 times a week.

Relaxation and fun

2 swimming pools, one with a children's area, equipped with beach umbrellas, sun loungers and beach towels, tennis court (payable during the evening), snorkeling equipment, canoes, table tennis, beach volleyball, beach tennis, bowls , gymnasium, billiards, children's playground, sauna, hammam and whirlpool at the spa (on reservation). For a fee, massages and treatments at the Spa and outdoor diving center.

Animation and miniclubs

Entertainment programs for adults, sports and tournaments with specialized staff, always present and never intrusive. For children 3/11 year scheduled Tarta program which also includes the two main meals and snacks, as well as games, creative workshops and music. For younger 12 to 17 year old Jek Club program with creative and dynamic activities, beach tournaments and music. Specially dedicated evening shows, for adults, kids and kids.

Restaurants and bars

Nautile main restaurant open for breakfast, lunch and dinner buffet, Côte Jardin restaurant open for lunch as a snack and dinner restaurant with à la carte service, a lounge bar offering snacks, sandwiches and pizza drinks from 10 am to 12 pm from 16.00 to 18.00, a pool bar serving soft drinks and smoothies from 10.00 to 12.30 and from 2.30 to 20.00; room service 24 h.

Location

Madirokely, Nosy Be. It is about 20 km from Nosy Be Airport.

The depths

The charm of Cayo Largo does not run out of course on the sandy surface. To find out all the way down, you need to go ... deep down. Apart from the turquoise water of the water, in addition to the nicest candor of the beaches, there is a submerged world. Literally. The depths of Cayo Largo deserve more than one visit. We would dive every day. Here, even the less experienced ones will have fun: the corals are already visible at modest heights so you do not have to go deep enough to re-look your eyes with the beauty of the reef. It is understood that the backdrops are a strong point of the place because of the presence of more than 30 dive sites: there is nothing but diving and discovering. Find out what? Colorful fish, corals, wrecks, underwater caves, walls covered with gorgonias and colorful sponges.
